## âœ” Checklist

Before submitting:

- [ ] Code builds with no errors (`nx run-many --target=build --all`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`nx run-many --target=test --all`)
- [ ] I added or updated tests when needed
- [ ] I updated documentation where appropriate
- [ ] I followed the project's coding conventions
- [ ] I used Conventional Commits
- [ ] I have reviewed the **Code of Conduct**
